title: Beethoven - Symphony No.5 in C minor [24 bit FLAC] vinyl
description:
Beethoven - Symphony No.5 in C minor [24 bit FLAC] vinyl

  Genre: Classical
  Source: Deutsche Grammophon 2530 516 (Original Press)
  Codec: FLAC
  Bitrate: ~ 2,600 kbps
  Bit Depth: 24
  Sampling Rate: 96 KHz

  A1 Allegro Con Brio (07:15)
  A2 Andante Con Moto (09:54)

  B1 Allegro (05:10)
  B2 Allegro (10:46)

  Personnel

  Composed - Ludwig van Beethoven (1770-1827)
  Conductor - Carlos Kleiber (1930-2004)
  Orchestra - Wiener Philharmoniker

  Recorded at the Musikvereinssaal Wien, Vienna, in 1974

  Rip Info  (not my rip)

  VPI HW-16.5 Record Cleaning Machine
  Audio Intelligent Vinyl Solutions No. 15 and No. 6 cleaning fluids
  Rega P25 Turntable 
  Rega Exact Cartridge
  Coda 01 Preamp
  Apogee Duet 2 external USB audio interface
  Mac Mini Core 2 Duo 2 GHz for capturing rip
  Sound Studio 4.5.4 recording software
  Mac Pro Dual Quad-Core Xeon 2.8 GHz for processing
  ClickRepair 3.8.4 (build 45e) and Amadeus Pro 2.1 for de-click (manual)
  iZotope RX Advanced 2.02.457 for Redbook conversion
  xACT 2.21 for Redbook SBE correction
  XLD Version 20130127 (142.3) for FLAC conversion

  RCM - TT - Exact - Coda preamp - ADC - Macbook Pro - 
  Sound Studio @ 24/96 - 
  Analyze (no clipping, DC Bias offset correction) - 
  Amadeus Pro - split into individual tracks - 
  ClickRepair - click repair in manual mode - iZotope - 
  FLAC encoded Level 8 with XLD
